item.title: DXC Technology Co 10-K
item.description: DXC Technology Co, which is in the Services-Computer Processing & Data Preparation [7374] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 26, 2022 had 44249 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 454 instances tax - 407 instances 31 - 398 instances fiscal - 392 instances march - 381 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
